/usr/tce/packages/clang/clang-11.0.0/bin/clang++  -g   CMakeFiles/threadfence_system.dir/threadfence_system.cpp.o  -o threadfence_system  -L/opt/rocm/lib64 -Wl,-rpath,/opt/rocm/lib64:/opt/rocm-3.10.0/hip/lib:/opt/rocm/lib /opt/rocm-3.10.0/hip/lib/libamdhip64.so.3.10.31000 --hip-link --cuda-gpu-arch=gfx900 --cuda-gpu-arch=gfx906 --cuda-gpu-arch=gfx908 -L/usr/tce/packages/clang/clang-11.0.0/lib/clang/11.0.0/include/../lib/linux -lclang_rt.builtins-x86_64 -Wl,-rpath-link,/opt/rocm/lib
